title: Page: Network Activities Members
memberDesc:
The SDSN and Members work closely with businesses and governments, particularly around the development and scaling up of new solutions.

The SDSN Great Lakes regularly communicates to its members through emails and its annual bulletin. We also organize annual conferences on SDGs and calls for local solutions to address local problems affecting the communities.
highlightProjectsSubtitle: Read more about our current work.
memberSubtitle: Membership in the Sustainable Development Solutions Network is free and open to institutions, including universities, research institutions, foundations, civil society, and other organizations.
contactCTA: See benefits of joining the network
